name: pong (itch) (darth_liutas)
description: i have been learning how to programme and thought it would be cool to make a videogame, i used a graphics library called sfml to make this, the game is unfinished in its current state, but soon it will have music more backgrounds, levels multiplayer local multiplayer etc, it also only works on windows but soon i'll include versions for other systems, one last thing, the reason its published in its current state is because i wanted to just realse it before i stopped working on it and left it to collect the dust, i'll try to finish it soon
